languages.text:
Из-за техночумы в начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} это существо может получать {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g}. Вероятность получения и возможные последствия:
-<indent=5%>20% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} на 1 раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный 20% от запаса {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} существа.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% вероятности получить нестабильный некродермис на 1 раунд.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 20% of the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>20% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} на 1 раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% вероятности получить урон, равный 20% от запаса {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} существа.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% вероятности получить {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} на 1 раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% вероятности получить нестабильный некродермис на 1 раунд.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
This creature may suffer a negative effect at the start of each turn due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become immobilised for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become staggered for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer damage equal to 20% of the creature's wounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become stunned for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:

-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 20% of the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

languages.text:
此生物受到技术枯萎症影响，每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都可能会获得{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。负面结果几率如下：
- <indent=5%>20%几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>10%几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一轮。</indent>
- <indent=5%>10%几率受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于此生物20%{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>5%几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一轮。</indent>
- <indent=5%>5%几率承受“惧亡外皮异变”效果，持续一轮。</indent>

This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:

-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

此生物受到技术枯萎症影响，每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都可能会获得{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}。负面结果几率如下：
- <indent=5%>20%几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>10%几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一轮。</indent>
- <indent=5%>10%几率受到伤害，等同于此生物20%{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>5%几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一轮。</indent>
- <indent=5%>5%几率承受“惧亡外皮异变”效果，持续一轮。</indent>

languages.text:
この生物は技術疾病によって各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受ける可能性がある。確率と結果は以下の通りである。
1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる確率が-<indent=5%>20%になる。</indent>
1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}になる確率が-<indent=5%>10%になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>10%の確率でその生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の20%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
1ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}になる確率が-<indent=5%>5%になる。</indent>
1ラウンドの間-<indent=5%>5%の確率でネクロダーミスが不安定になる。</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる確率が-<indent=5%>20％になる。</indent>

-<indent=5%>10％の確率でその生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の20％に相当するダメージを受ける。</indent>

1ラウンドの間-<indent=5%>5％の確率でネクロダーミスが不安定になる。</indent>

languages.text:
Esta criatura puede sufrir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} a consecuencia de la tecnoplaga. Las probabilidades y resultados son los siguientes:
-<indent=5%>20 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 asalto.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % de probabilidad de sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual al 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 asalto.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5 % de probabilidad de sufrir inestabilidad necrodérmica durante 1 asalto.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 20% of the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Esta criatura puede sufrir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} a consecuencia de la tecnoplaga. Las probabilidades y resultados son los siguientes:
-<indent=5%>20 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 asalto.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % de probabilidad de sufrir daño igual al 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>5 % de probabilidad de sufrir inestabilidad necrodérmica durante 1 asalto.</indent>

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur kann zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} aufgrund der Tech-Seuche einen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} erleiden. Die Chancen und Ergebnisse sind wie folgt:
-<indent=5%> 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang 20 % Chance, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%> 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang 10 % Chance, mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g} belegt zu werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % Chance, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe von 20 % der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Kreatur zu erleiden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5 % Chance, 1 Runde lang Nekrodermis-Instabilität zu erleiden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5 % Chance, 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 20% of the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Diese Kreatur kann zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} aufgrund der Tech-Seuche einen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekt{/g} erleiden. Die Chancen und Resultate sind wie folgt:
-<indent=5%>20% Chance, für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% Chance, für 1 Runde zu {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumeln{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% Chance, Schaden in Höhe von 20% der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Kreatur zu erleiden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% Chance, für 1 Runde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% Chance, 1 Runde lang unter Nekrodermis-Instabilität zu leiden.</indent>

languages.text:
Cette créature peut subir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en raison de la technopeste. Il en découle ce qui suit :
-<indent=5%>20 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10 % de chances de subir un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} égal à 20% de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la créature.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5 % de chances de subir Instabilité nécrodermique pendant 1 round.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 20% of the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Cette créature peut subir un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en raison d'un Techno-Fléau. Il en découle ce qui suit :
- <indent=5%>20 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
- <indent=5%>10 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 round.</indent>
- <indent=5%>10 % de chances de subir un nombre de points de dégâts égal à 20% de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la créature.</indent>
- <indent=5%>5 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 round.</indent>
- <indent=5%>5 % de chances de subir Instabilité Nécrodermique pendant 1 round.</indent>

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başında tekno afetinden dolayı bir {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiye{/g} maruz kalabilir. Olasılıklar ve sonuçları şunlardır:
-<indent=5%>%20 olasılıkla {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>%10 olasılıkla {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallar{/g}. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>%10 olasılıkla {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %20'si kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} uğrar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>%5 olasılıkla {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>%5 olasılıkla nekrodermis istikrarsızlığına maruz kalır. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature may suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} due to the tech-blight. The chances and outcomes are as follows:
-<indent=5%>20% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10% chance to suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 20% of the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>5% chance to suffer necrodermis instability for 1 round.</indent>
